definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: You must come to God through Jesus to receive your forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 你必须通过耶稣接受上帝给与的宽恕。

sentences.english: Listen carefully to what children are saying and respond supportively.
sentences.chinese: 要仔细聆听孩子们再说什么并给与积极的回应。

sentences.english: These pleasures the rat lever machine wasn't giving us.
sentences.chinese: 这些快乐是老鼠杠杆机器无法给与我们的。

sentences.english: The garment of friendship is knitted by the needles of give and take .
sentences.chinese: 友谊的外衣是给与取的针缝起来的。

sentences.english: The new system leaves less opportunity for personal advancement.
sentences.chinese: 新制度给与个人较少的升迁机会。

sentences.english: Therefore the cervix of the uterus cyst patient should give enough takes seriously, should the active treatment.
sentences.chinese: 因此得了宫颈囊肿患者应给与足够重视，应积极治疗。
伤后分3组给与不等量的水和钠。

sentences.english: Mercy is "giving happiness", giving all living beings joy and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 慈是快乐，就是给与一切众生快乐。

sentences.english: If you believe you don’t have anything to give, think again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信你没有任何可以给与的东西，请再三考虑。

sentences.english: When the Venusians were ready to receive, the Martians were ready to give.
sentences.chinese: 当金星人准备接受，火星人也会准备好给与。

sentences.english: Do you think there is a synchronicity in the types of giving that we can do?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我们能够去实现以给与的形式同时发生的事情？

sentences.english: The Spurs don't know what to expect this season out of Ian Mahinmi.
sentences.chinese: 马刺不知道这个赛季会给与马辛米怎样的斯待。

sentences.english: Paying an extra tax should not give anyone the right to pollute.
sentences.chinese: 另付一个税费也不应就此给与任何人污染的权利。

sentences.english: WSM: Thanks for helping me during my hardest time.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢在我最艰难的时刻，给与了我帮助。

sentences.english: This created an association with the life-giving powers of the sun and the sun god Ra.
sentences.chinese: 这创造一个太阳和那太阳神拉给与生命动力的联想。

sentences.english: I also have to say God is the best giver among all the other loves.
sentences.chinese: 我还要说神是众多爱的给与者中最佳的施者。

definition: to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
